TestCase.TestCaseObjective: To verify that the National MIP solution provides the ability to logically delete information from a topic. The schemas contain an element "Operation" in the Message Holder metadata. This element is intended to carry the information about what kind of operation is supposed to be performed on/with the associated data (e.g. deletion).
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates some tactical objects in its National C2IS in predefined topics. Nation B subscribes to Nation A's topics. Nation A deletes some BSOs. The deletion is carried within the "Operation" element. Nation B receives the new BSO status from Nation A. The BSOs are logically deleted from the topic.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has pre-defined Topics: Forces - Friendly and Neutral, Forces - Unknown, Control Features, Control Measures - Obstacles and Facilities, Fire Support - Targets
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: The test is passed if Nation B receives the logical delete object status from Nation A. The deleted objects shall be removed from the situation picture.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a number of BSOs.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation A can see all the objects in its C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation B subscribes to Nation A's topics.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and can see all the BSOs from Nation A in Nation A's topics.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A deletes a number of BSOs from those created in Step 1.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation A can see those objects logically deleted from the topics.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation B receives "Operation" = 'Deletion' in the Message Holder metadata for each of the deleted objects.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B displays the same objects as Nation A. The deleted objects are logically deleted from the topics.
